subject: Monte Carlo Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic, the defending champion, raced into the Monte Carlo Masters quarterfinals, dispatching Pablo Carreño Busta, 6-0, 6-1, in 47 minutes.
snippet: Novak Djokovic, the defending champion, raced into the Monte Carlo Masters quarterfinals, dispatching Pablo Carreño Busta, 6-0, 6-1, in 47 minutes.
